subtitles: 16016 18310 First, there was darkness.
19853 22731 Then came the Strangers.

22731 25526 They were a race
as old as time itself.

26610 29279 They had mastered
the ultimate technology--

29321 34576 the ability to alter
physical reality by will alone.

34618 37246 They called this ability
"Tuning."
38413 40290 But they were dying.

40332 43335 Their civilization was
in decline,

43335 46088 and so they abandoned
their world,

46171 48841 seeking a cure
for their own mortality.

50217 53679 Their endless journey brought
them to a small, blue world...

53720 55848 in the farthest corner
of the galaxy.
56890 58350 Our world.

59393 61395 Here, they thought
they had finally found...

61436 63397 what they had been
searching for.

74199 77077 My name is
Dr. Daniel Poe Schreber.
78078 79746 I am just a man.

79788 82583 I help the Strangers
conduct their experiments.
84126 86211 I have betrayed my own kind.
293627 295462 You are confused, aren't you?

295504 298298 Frightened. That's all right.
I can help you.

298298 299967 -Who is this?
-I'm a doctor.

299967 302636 You must listen to me.
You have lost your memory.

302678 304805 There was an experiment.
Something went wrong.

304847 307015 Your memory was erased.
Do you understand me?

307099 309142 No, I don't understand.
What's going on here?

309184 311979 There are people coming for you
as we speak.

312020 314314 Don't let them find you.
Leave now.
315524 317693 Hello? Are you there?

359860 362321 Hey, Mr. Murdoch,
the Automat called.
362362 363864 Said you left your wallet there.

364907 368535 I suggest you retrieve it, since
you only paid for three weeks,
368577 370370 and they was up 10 minutes ago.
372414 373916 I've been here three weeks?

373916 377085 It's right there
in black and white, Mr. Murdoch.
377127 379546 Day and date.

379588 382883 We make our books like we make
our beds, all neat and tidy.

382925 385886 -I'll take care of it later.
-See that you do.

385969 388055 Only thing makes you a guest
in this joint...
388096 389515 is cash on the barrelhead!

407407 410118 House rules.
Three weeks is three weeks.
410160 412704 No days off for good behavior.

423632 427302 Mr. Murdoch, yes?
Where is he?

427302 430764 He just left
not five minutes ago.

436478 440482 When the rumba rhythm
start to play
440566 442734 Dance with me
442776 445821 Make me sway
445863 449825 Like a lazy ocean hugs the shore
449867 452077 Hold me close
452119 454997 Sway me more

454997 459293 Like a flower bending
in the breeze
459334 461795 Bend with me
461795 464631 Sway with ease

464673 468677 When we dance,
you have a way with me
468677 471138 Stay with me
471138 473682 Sway with me

474474 478520 Hey, sweetie, he said he was
your husband's doctor.
478604 480147 He wanted to speak with you.

503587 505172 -Doctor...
-Schreber.

505214 509218 Please, won't you come in?
You must be Emma Murdoch.

510552 514014 Thank you for coming to see me
on such short notice.
514056 515474 What is this?

515516 519061 A rather crude experiment
designed to further my studies.

519144 522814 I don't understand. You say
you're my husband's doctor,

522856 525400 but he never
mentioned you to me.

525442 528237 The truth is Mrs Murdoch, John has been
coming to see me...
528278 529738 for quite some time.

529738 533116 He had been grappling
with feelings of betrayal...

533158 536203 stemming from
your marital difficulties.

536245 538163 -John told you what happened.
-Yes.

539540 541875 When was the last time
that you saw him?

541875 544753 Three weeks ago.
He packed a suitcase.
544795 547297 He was very angry at me.

547381 550217 I understand how difficult
this must be for you,
550259 551593 but for John's sake,

551593 554596 I would like you to think of me
as your friend, Emma.

554596 558225 It appears that John
has suffered a psychotic break.

558225 561395 -Complete memory loss.
-You can't be serious.

561436 564398 Oh, but I am.
He may be delusional.
564439 565732 Even violent.

567067 571029 If he were to contact you,
you must call me immediately.

571071 573532 Wherever your husband is,
he is searching...
575284 576493 For himself.

586670 590591 Good evening, Mr. Murdoch.
It is Mr. Murdoch, isn't it?
591508 594970 Mr. "J" something Murdoch?

598307 602477 J. Murdoch. What's your name?
Justin? Jerry?

606815 608901 My name's Jason Murdoch.
John Murdoch.

608942 611528 Jake Murdoch. How's it going?
Hi. Jack Murdoch.
617868 619620 Got to get a grip on myself.

643685 647105 I told the guy,
cash on the barrelhead.

647147 650442 I said, "Listen,
three weeks is three weeks."

650484 654071 -Where's our lucky winner?
-Upstairs, sir. Room 614.
655322 656657 The call girl.

661286 664206 -Evening, Husselbeck.
-Inspector Bumstead.
664206 665958 Your lace is untied.
676885 678512 Am I glad you're here, sir.

678554 681181 They say Detective Walenski's
got the heebie-jeebies.

681223 683392 Just take what they give me,
Husselbeck.

714256 716800 -Thanks a lot.
-Excuse me.

719261 721054 -Hello?
-Oh, it's you.

721763 724433 -You left your wallet here buddy.
-When did I do that?

724474 726727 -When you was last here.
-When was that?

726768 730105 When you left your wallet.
Expect me to remember?

735944 738697 -Excuse me!
-No, no, seriously.

756089 757925 -Where you headed, chief?
-Home.
757966 759301 And where's home?

759301 762137 Haven't you mugs got
anything better to do?
762137 764431 Wll I'm just trying to do my job, May.
764473 766475 There's a killer out there in case you didnt noticed.

766517 769186 Maybe you should be out looking for him
instead of cooling your heels.
772481 774233 Go on. Get out of here.

787496 790290 What's that make so far?
Six hookers in all?

790290 793210 -I believe so, sir.
-Give the man an "A" for effort.
798632 800968 So, Husselbeck,

801009 807474 what kind of killer do you think
stops to save a dying fish?

807516 809393 -Got me, sir.
-Bumstead.

809393 812729 What took you? This killer's
been running circles around us,
812729 813856 thanks to Walenski.

813897 815649 With all due respect,
Chief lnspector,

815691 818777 I've known Eddie a long time,
and he's a good cop.

818819 821029 Whatever kind of cop
Walenski once was...
821071 822990 he let drift a long time ago.
823031 824825 Let me talk to Bumstead!
824867 826910 Come on! Hold on!

831832 833876 -Get his arm !
-They're watching us!

833917 836170 -On your feet!
-There's no way out!
837588 839339 God, can't you see?

842718 845053 Let me go!
I'm not going to hurt you.

846597 848849 -What was that?
-Walenski.

857191 860319 I'm being punished
for my sins, right?

860360 864698 What did I ever do to inherit
this? Where do you begin?

864698 867659 Well, everything Detective
Walenski committed to paper...
867701 869119 should be here, so--

869161 871788 The only thing that should be
committed is Walenski.

874082 875959 Nothing like
a little healthy paranoia.

882549 885886 I came here to file a missing
persons report for my husband.

885928 889306 -Take it to the front desk.
-They told me to come see you.
891600 893268 His name's John Murdoch.

896313 899650 Do these names mean
anything to you?
900484 902444 Who are these women?

902486 904363 Why are you looking
for my husband?

904404 906657 Are you going to accuse him
of something?

906698 910244 -Maybe. Maybe murder.
-Whose murder?

911662 914915 -Which one?
-All of them.

916333 919628 Mrs. Murdoch, I am sorry.
I didn't mean to alarm you.

919670 922422 I'm sorry that I came.
I just made a mistake.

922464 926260 If you'd please just give me
half a second to explain.
935644 936854 We met before?

938522 941608 If we did,
I hope you're still breathing.
941650 943193 What's your name, honey?

946947 948740 Well, that's
an appropriate name.
956665 957958 I was just thinking.

964965 970012 It seems kind of dangerous...
right now.

970053 972014 I mean how do you know
I'm not the killer?

972014 975309 You don't seem like
the killer type. Why?

976226 978478 You feeling any urges
I should know about?

1039373 1043210 So it seems you've discovered
your unpleasant nature.

1043252 1047047 -Who are you?
-We might ask the same question yes.

1130214 1133383 What is to be done?
This man is dangerous.

1133467 1136553 -It is said he is able to Tune.
-Impossible!

1136637 1139681 We have seen it
with our own eyes.

1139681 1142559 On occasion, the imprinting
does not take.

1142559 1145145 They behave erratically
when they awaken.

1145187 1148857 We find them wandering
like lost children.
1148899 1151026 But this one was different, yes?

1151068 1154821 -What has the doctor to say about this?
-He has failed to report in.

1154863 1157950 -And Mr. Quick?
-No more Mr. Quick.
1157991 1160619 Mr. Quick...dead, yes.
1163997 1166667 Poor, poor Mr. Quick.
1166667 1169586 Mr. Book...does he know?
1170587 1172673 Should we not know, Mr. Hand?

1173674 1176552 We had hoped to learn more
before sharing with you.

1176593 1179555 We can know nothing
until we possess him.
1179555 1181849 We must have this man.
1187771 1188939 My brand, I hope.
1201243 1202828 I've been soo worried about you.
1206874 1208208 Are you punishing me?

1208959 1211587 If disappearing is
your way of punishing me,
1211628 1212880 I don't appreciate it.
1212880 1214047 I don't what are you talking about?

1217593 1221388 I found these keys in my pocket,
so I assume I live here.

1223557 1225893 -You supposed to be my wife?
-"Supposed to be"?

1229438 1233442 You really...don't know
who I am, do you.

1234318 1237112 Your doctor called me. He was
worried that this might happen.

1241366 1245037 He gave me his card.
He's desperate to find you.

1252794 1254796 Feel like I'm living out
someone else's nightmare.

1254838 1257633 What happened to me?
Why was I seeing a doctor?
1258258 1259760 I had an affair.
1261637 1262971 You were angry at me.

1266141 1269853 Closing time.
The pool is now closed.
1279571 1281907 Most unfortunate it is...

1281949 1284243 that we were forced
to seek you out here.

1285202 1289331 You know how uncomfortable
we find all this moisture.

1290207 1293502 -I'm sorry. I--
-Failed to report in, yes?

1293544 1296505 I was frightened.
I have a weak heart, you know.

1296505 1300050 Your weakness is not, we think,
an affair of the heart.
1300133 1302803 We found this in his hotel room.

1302845 1306348 Must we reproduce
Mr. Murdoch's memories again?

1306348 1308517 I tried to reprint him,
but he woke up.

1308559 1310727 He knocked the syringe
right out of my hand.

1310811 1314022 -He has no memories, then?
-Only fragments.

1314022 1315566 The procedure,
it was interrupted.

1315566 1318318 I guess it's only a matter
of rounding him up.

1319069 1320779 You have had strays
before, right?

1320821 1324700 This is no stray, Doctor.
This one can Tune.

1324700 1327786 But that's impossible.
Only you have that ability.

1327828 1330080 You will process
another template...
1330122 1332165 of the subject's memories, yes?

1332207 1333834 Of course.
I'll imprint him again.

1335377 1338672 We require them
for a quite different purpose.

1338672 1341508 It's almost midnight,
Dr. Schreber.

1341508 1343385 We'll talk again
after tonight's Tuning,
1343385 1346346 but no more delays, yes?

1346388 1351185 No more inconsistencies
in your behavior.
1353061 1354730 The police were looking for you.
1354730 1356899 I know. I saw the papers.

1356940 1359443 "Killer stalks
city street-walkers."
1363071 1365365 I was with one of those women.

1366909 1370329 -Before I came here tonight.
-I don't understand.

1370370 1375250 I met her outside an Automat.
I guess I wanted to test myself.

1376960 1380380 I wanted to know if I had it
in me to do those things.
1380380 1381882 Maybe I have lost my mind,

1381924 1384927 but whoever I am, I'm still me,
and I'm not a killer.
1390933 1392309 I believe you.

1399942 1401944 -What?
-The car outside.
1401985 1403445 The one you arrived in.

1403487 1405781 It's a cop.
He dropped me off here.
1407950 1409701 I didn't know he was still here.
1413288 1414706 Hold it right there, mister!

1417125 1420128 -Wait. You have the wrong man.
-Stand aside, will you, please?
1420170 1421630 I didn't kill anyone.

1421672 1423966 Right now,
all you are is a suspect.

1424007 1427261 Turn yourself in. I'll listen
to whatever you have to say.

1427302 1429346 You won't believe
what I have to say.

1430472 1433809 -Try me.
-There's someone after me.

1433809 1437479 It's this group of men.
They want me dead.

1437479 1440357 And I don't even know if...
they're not even--

1440357 1442609 Yeah, who's going to listen
to a madman?

1442651 1445153 -Stand aside, Mrs. Murdoch.
-Run!
1449491 1451451 No one ever listens to me.
1457708 1458792 Murdoch, stop!

1501668 1504004 -How much further?
-We're almost there, buddy.

1507508 1509885 You happen to know
the way to Shell Beach?

1509927 1513013 You're kidding! Me and the wife
spent our honeymoon there.

1513055 1515557 All you do is
take Main Street West to...

1518560 1521772 Or is it the Cross...
Now, that's funny.

1521855 1524942 I can't seem to remember
if it's Main Street West...
1525025 1526318 or the Crosstown.

1530989 1534034 I'm sorry, lnspector,
I cannot be of more assistance,

1534117 1536078 but I am running late
for an appointment.

1536119 1538247 Well, I appreciate you
taking the time.

1546922 1549383 There's just one thing
that puzzles me.

1549383 1553929 I've met quite a few murderers
in the course of my work.

1553971 1556723 Murdoch doesn't
strike me as one.

1556765 1559935 Perhaps you are not accustomed
to digging deep enough.

1559977 1562813 Well, I do know when
someone is lying to me, Doctor.

1562896 1567109 Inspector, judging personalities
happens to be my business.

1567109 1569111 Maybe you can give me
a few pointers.

1569152 1573115 Certainly.
Let's take you, for instance.

1573156 1576243 You are a fastidious man.
Driven.
1576326 1578579 Consumed by details.

1578620 1582124 I would say
your life is rather lonely.

1582165 1584793 Good evening, lnspector.
I really must be going.

1628629 1630380 -How is he?
-The same.
1631673 1634343 Walenski? It's me, Frank.
1640682 1641892 Come in, Frank.
1645187 1646396 Close the door.

1654446 1657741 I've been looking through
some of your old reports.
1657783 1659868 It's an interesting case.
1660994 1664206 Kind that make a man's career.

1665916 1669545 -Or break it.
-Yeah. I was on that case.

1669586 1673382 And then what?
What happened then, Eddie?
1673423 1674842 Nothing happened, Frank.

1675884 1677886 I've just been spending time
in the subway,
1677928 1679888 riding in circles.

1679888 1683433 Thinking in circles.
There's no way out.
1685727 1687396 I've been over this entire city.

1691900 1693777 You're scaring your wife
to death, Eddie.
1693819 1695320 She's not my wife.

1697155 1700117 I don't know who she is
or who any of us are.

1700158 1703537 -What makes you say that?
-You think about the past much?
1705581 1707082 As much as the next guy.

1708083 1710836 See, I've been trying
to remember things--

1710919 1713964 clearly remember things
from my past.

1714006 1716133 But the more
I try to think back,

1716216 1719219 the more it all starts
to unravel.
1719261 1720429 None of it seems real.

1720429 1724600 It's like I've just
been dreaming this life,

1724600 1727603 and when I finally wake up,
I'll be somebody else,
1727644 1729646 somebody totally different.

1734026 1736195 You saw something,
didn't you, Eddie.
1737321 1739865 Something to do with the case.

1740449 1743827 There is no case!
There never was!

1743869 1747789 It's all just a big joke!
It's a joke!
1788830 1790582 Tonight's requirements are...
1790624 1793877 12 family photo albums,
1793919 1796338 nine personal diaries,
1798549 1800968 assorted childhood photographs,

1801009 1805180 requisite false l.D.s
and social security cards.
1805180 1807516 These do bring back memories.
1809852 1812145 This one is still warm.

1814064 1817317 The recollections of
a great lover?
1817359 1819653 A catalogue of conquests?
1820362 1821864 We will soon find out.

1823156 1824658 You wouldn't
appreciate that,

1824700 1827911 would you,
Mr. Whatever-your-name is?

1827953 1832249 Not the sort of conquest
you would ever understand.

1835627 1838380 A touch of
unhappy childhood...

1844011 1846555 A dash of
teenage rebellion...
1848182 1851268 And last but not least...

1851268 1853896 a tragic death
in the family.

1865407 1868994 Why does Murdoch not sleep
during the Tuning?

1869036 1873290 Maybe he's a step up
the evolutionary ladder.
1873332 1874541 A freak of nature.

1874583 1877419 He's adapting to survive.
What do you expect?

1877461 1879421 Weren't you looking for
the human soul?

1879421 1882090 Isn't that the purpose
of your little zoo?

1882090 1885469 That's why you change people
and things every night.

1885469 1888305 Maybe you have finally
found what you are looking for,

1888388 1889932 and it's going to bite you
on your--

1893977 1895896 It requires several
of your lifetimes...
1895938 1897606 to master our gifts.

1897648 1899441 The idea that
a simple man...

1899483 1901485 could develop the ability
to Tune is--
1901527 1902653 Absurd, I know.
1902694 1904988 What other explanation is there?
1957040 1958500 Shut it down.

1977019 1980147 Fredrickson says he'll take me
off the night shift.
1980189 1982024 It's about time, dear.
2058100 2060269 Can anyone hear me?
2063438 2066275 Let the Tuning commence.
2226143 2227519 The Goodwins.
2227519 2229479 Charlie, Sylvia,
2229563 2231648 Jane, and little Matthew.
2235527 2237738 Jane and little Matthew.
2267893 2270187 The rich get richer.

2270229 2272272 Probably have
maid's quarters...

2272356 2273690 before the night
is through.
2327244 2329204 Dr. Schreber, I presume.

2331874 2334042 That's no way to greet
a patient, Doctor,
2334042 2336211 if that's what you are.
2337713 2339548 Why is everyone asleep?
2339590 2341967 Please keep your voice down.

2342050 2343927 I can't remember anything.
What have you done?
2343969 2346763 Nothing. I want to help you.

2346805 2350267 We cannot talk here.
If they see us together--

2350309 2353145 I don't care.
I want some answers. Now!

2353228 2356315 Who are they?
Why are they trying to kill me?

2363655 2366700 -You really can do it.
-I did that?

2366742 2369369 Listen to me.
You have their power.

2369411 2371371 You can make things happen
by will alone.
2371413 2372998 They call it "Tuning."

2373040 2375000 That is how they change
the buildings.

2375083 2377586 Just now you acted
out of self-defense,

2377628 2380422 but I can teach you
to control your power.

2380422 2384426 We can stop them.
We can take the city back.

2443443 2445779 He made a terrible impression
for the firm,

2445821 2448657 Iollygagging around
as he did.

2448699 2451577 So I told Fredrickson
I was letting him go.
2451618 2453620 Well you should have, darling.

2454329 2457416 He attacked me.
I don't know where he's gone.

2457916 2461879 Come, Dr. Schreber.
We have much to do.

2466925 2473390 They say that
you're a runaround lover
2474433 2482524 Though you say it isn't so

2485402 2492201 But if you put me down
for another
2493827 2499708 I'll know, believe me, I'll know

2501210 2504713 Tonight's experiment will
take place in these locations.

2504713 2508759 The first subject
shall be imprinted on Avenue M.
2508800 2511803 Mr. Book, there is a problem.
2511887 2513430 There is no Avenue M.

2513472 2515390 We were unable
to complete it.

2515432 2518894 During the last Tuning,
we detected a lack of control.

2518936 2522147 An opposing influence
on the machines?

2522231 2526443 This man Murdoch is
more powerful than we thought.
2526485 2528445 He is becoming like us.
2528445 2531865 So we must become like him.
2532783 2535118 The doctor has done as we asked?

2535160 2538872 The life and times
of John Murdoch, volume two.
2540874 2543460 We must not do this.

2543502 2546922 Murdoch does not possess
these memories, yes?

2546922 2549758 How will his imprint
allow us to find him?

2549800 2553262 Everywhere he goes,
everyone he seeks out...
2553303 2554513 will be known to us.

2554596 2559685 And as he follows the clues,
so shall we follow the memories.
2559768 2562187 But to imprint one of us?
2562187 2564940 Failure has always resulted.

2564982 2568527 What Mr. Hand proposes
is our only option.
2575576 2577494 This may sting a bit.
2618202 2622039 I have John Murdoch in mind.

2624333 2628337 "Found this postcard
among your mother's things.

2628378 2630672 "Brings back memories,
doesn't it?
2630672 2632508 "Stop by sometime.

2632549 2635886 "We'll see if we can't
hook ourselves another mermaid.
2635886 2638222 "Love to Emma. Karl."
2646563 2648232 Karl Harris.

2665707 2668752 Excuse me.
Which way is Avenue C?
2668794 2670045 Try the subway.
2673757 2675259 You got a problem, pal?
2675300 2678136 Been working here long?

2678220 2681557 25 years.
No days off for good behavior.
2706665 2709585 We're looking for John Murdoch.

2743827 2745913 She knows nothing,
Mr. Hand.
2745954 2747789 A dead end, Mr. Wall.

2747831 2750626 We thought his imprint
would let us track him.

2750626 2753128 But instead
we have been brought here.

2753170 2757216 -This is irrational.
-Instincts are irrational.

2757299 2760552 We must follow
where they lead, yes?

2760636 2763847 Mr. Sleep suggests he may go
to places familiar.
2765307 2767351 He does not care about our job.
2767351 2770187 Indulge us, Mr. Hand.
2770229 2772898 If you were Murdoch, yes?
2772898 2776276 If I were Murdoch...

2778070 2781573 I would remember how
my wife had hurt me...
2781615 2783659 by sleeping with another man.

2788580 2792000 I would look for a way
to hurt her in return.

2795003 2799591 Leave me alone with her.
There's work to be done.

2803262 2805389 All change,
platform three.

2809226 2811562 Excuse me, how do I get
to the end of the line?
2811562 2813063 You want the Express.
2825659 2828120 How come the train didn't stop?
2828161 2829413 That's the Express.
2830956 2832875 There's no way out.

2832916 2835711 You can't get out of the city.
I've tried.
2836879 2838922 You're Murdoch, aren't you?

2838964 2840632 The one
they've been looking for.
2840716 2841800 You're not a killer.

2841884 2844595 They set you up with
a fake identity,
2844595 2846263 Iike everyone else here.

2846263 2848223 -Who are you?
-I was a cop.
2848265 2851393 At least in this life I was.
2851435 2854271 They steal peoples' memories.

2854313 2856106 Then they swap them around
between us.

2856148 2858859 I seen them do it,
back and forth...

2858901 2861028 till no one knows
who they are anymore.
2861069 2862362 How do you know all this?

2862404 2864198 Once in a while one of us
wakes up...
2864239 2865657 while they're changing things.

2866575 2869077 It's not supposed to happen,
but it does.
2869119 2870454 It happened to me.
2871121 2872998 They'll come looking for you.

2874124 2876460 Just like they'll come
looking for me.
2877920 2879171 I figured a way out.
2890641 2891850 They were here.
2895437 2897648 This was to be his home.
2900317 2902110 That was when we loved her.
2902152 2904488 This is all well and good,

2904530 2906532 but we require
a more practical link...
2906573 2908617 to his present whereabouts.
2913247 2915249 And I know where to find her.

2923674 2927010 We're very lucky,
when you think about it.

2928136 2930180 To be able to revisit
those places...

2930180 2932182 which meant
so very much to us.

2933016 2935561 I thought we were haunted
by them.

2937396 2939857 There used to be a ferry
when I was a boy.
2939898 2941984 Biggest thing you ever saw.

2942025 2944862 Lit up like
a floating birthday cake.

2946238 2948824 That's just what my husband
once said to me.
2948866 2950409 On this very spot.
2951910 2953996 Where is your husband now?

2954037 2957833 I wish I knew.
What brings you here?
2957833 2960711 I met my wife at this place.
2960752 2963005 It's where I met my husband.
2963046 2964548 Small world.
3067067 3068944 What are you doing here?
3068986 3070612 I've been following you.
3074533 3076243 Hold it right there!
3082416 3083709 It's been so damn long,

3083750 3085878 I thought you'd forgotten
your Uncle Karl.
3087045 3088463 You son of a gun!

3100058 3102227 -Is that me?
-Yeah.

3110527 3112279 Shell Beach is where
I grew up?

3112321 3114948 That's what I said.
Shell Beach.

3114990 3117409 -Your home town.
-I need to get there.
3117451 3118493 How do I get there?

3119912 3122831 I don't know.
I haven't been there in years.

3122873 3125751 You must remember.
You must have some idea.
3127711 3128921 Sorry, Johnny.

3130339 3132883 The old cracker barrel
ain't what it used to be.

3136720 3140182 -It was so bright there.
-Brighter times, I guess.

3141934 3145229 You were always scribbling
in that damn book.
3145270 3147231 That's me and your Pa.

3147272 3149608 What a couple of
handsome fools.
3149608 3151193 What happened to my parents?
3153737 3154863 Where are they now?
3156114 3157908 They're dead, Johnny.

3157950 3160702 They died when the house
burned down.
3160744 3162371 I looked after you.

3163288 3165040 You don't remember that,
really?
3167918 3170420 What's that? What is that?

3178095 3180430 You burned your arm pretty bad
in the fire.
3185978 3187563 What does it mean?
3187604 3189606 It means these are all lies!

3193694 3196029 My husband told me
he'd been here.

3196071 3198866 He told me he wanted
to test himself.
3212462 3214298 I wanted to talk to her.

3214298 3216258 I thought she could
help me find him.
3217968 3219970 I'm going to call the station.
3236153 3237404 It's beautiful.
3240073 3242910 It was a gift from my mother.
3242951 3244494 She died recently.

3245871 3248165 I keep it with me
to remind me of her.
3255005 3257174 It's a funny thing, though.

3257174 3259635 I can't remember
when she gave it to me.

3262054 3264515 How do you think I could
forget a thing like that?
3266016 3268477 What's happening, lnspector?
3268519 3270312 I'm not sure I know anymore.

3274316 3276068 I left your old room
like it was.
3277110 3279363 You can sleep here tonight.
3279404 3281532 Glad to have you back, Johnny.

3281532 3284326 -Even if it is for just a night.
-Karl.

3285452 3288121 -Is that the right time?
-Why, sure.

3288163 3290582 That clock's kept perfect time
since I bought it.

3293627 3296046 -What do you think?
-I don't understand.

3296046 3298882 How can it be night already?
What happened to the day?

3298882 3301385 You're tired.
Anything's possible.
3303053 3304054 Get some sleep.

3304054 3306557 We'll straighten all this out
tomorrow.

3360319 3363322 He's here.
He's acting peculiar.
3363363 3365741 I know. He's not himself.

3365782 3367826 Keep him there,
and I'll be right over.

3367868 3370120 -I'll try.
-Thanks. Bye.

3373665 3377044 I can't promise anything.
We'll play it as it comes.
3377794 3380631 We just wanted to help.
3387304 3390974 Karl. Uncle Karl.

3390974 3394478 If you're in trouble,
maybe we can do something.
3395938 3398440 Haven't seen you in so long.

3473015 3477686 Mr. Murdoch, you've been
the cause of much distress.

3482524 3484902 -Start talking.
-There's no need for this.

3484943 3488530 There's no escape.
The city's ours. We made it.
3488572 3489907 What are you talking about?

3489948 3493035 We fashioned this city
on stolen memories.

3493076 3496830 Different eras, different pasts,
all rolled into one.

3496872 3500918 Each night we revise it,
refine it, in order to learn.

3500959 3504004 -Learn what?
-About you.

3504087 3508467 You and your fellow inhabitants.
What makes you human.

3508467 3511970 -Why?
-We need to be like you.
3512804 3514932 I understand you now.

3514932 3518560 I remember that which you do
not, what you've been missing.

3518602 3524107 The ocean, yes? Running along
the waves as a child.

3524149 3528695 Meeting Emma at the river,
that first kiss that followed.

3529655 3532783 -What are you?
-You've seen what we are.
3532824 3535410 We use your dead as vessels.

3681598 3685519 -What about her? Ring a bell?
-She was alive when I left her.

3685519 3688564 -What about this?
-This is nothing.

3688605 3690816 It must mean something--
all those pictures.
3690816 3691859 What pictures?

3693318 3696196 -I don't understand this.
-Stop playing games with me.

3696238 3698699 -Stop telling me lies.
-I am not telling lies!

3698740 3701076 Help me out.
Make me understand.

3701118 3706081 I have this jigsaw puzzle in
my face, and it makes no sense.

3706123 3709459 You think it makes sense to me?
I'm as confused as you are.

3709501 3713463 Let me ask you a question.
Have you heard of Shell Beach?

3713463 3715632 -Sure.
-You know how to get there?

3717885 3723182 -Right. You just go to the...
-Where? Where do you go?
3723182 3724850 Give me a second, will you?
3726810 3728395 You can't remember, can you?
3729771 3732274 Thinking that's kind of odd?
3733483 3735569 Wait. I got a better one.

3735611 3739364 When was the last time you
did something during the day?

3739990 3742951 -What do you mean?
-I just mean during the day.

3744161 3746914 Daylight. When was the last
time you remember seeing it?

3746955 3750667 I'm not talking about a distant,
half-forgotten childhood memory.

3750709 3753504 I mean, like, yesterday.
Last week? When?
3754421 3756173 Do you have a single memory?
3758008 3759718 You don't, do you?

3759718 3765265 I don't think the sun
even exists in this place.

3765349 3769520 'Cause I've been up for hours
and hours, and night never ends.

3770103 3772356 -That's crazy.
-You're damn right it's crazy.

3772397 3775984 But listen to me, Bumstead.
It's not just me.

3776026 3778946 It's all of us. They're doing
something to all of us.

3778987 3780864 Shut up.
I've heard enough.

3780864 3783617 -Please listen--
-Shut up!
3794044 3796880 There has to be an explanation.
3804263 3805222 Explain this.

3829621 3832583 I never meant to hurt you.
I don't know why I did.
3832583 3834418 I wish I could take it back.
3835085 3837421 You didn't do it.
3837421 3839131 This affair of yours,

3839173 3842259 whatever you think you've done,
you didn't do it.
3842301 3843468 I don't believe it happened.

3843510 3847306 -What do you mean?
-This will sound crazy.

3847347 3850517 What if we never knew
each other before now?

3850517 3856773 What if the first time we met
was last night in our apartment?
3856815 3859526 And everything you remember,

3859568 3862779 and everything I'm supposed to
remember never really happened.

3862821 3865282 Someone just wants us
to think it did.
3866241 3867743 But how can that be true?

3868368 3871371 I so vividly remember
meeting you.

3872664 3875042 I remember falling in love
with you.

3876627 3879630 -I remember losing you.
-Time's up.

3881173 3886011 No, wait, please.
Just one more minute.
3892518 3894019 I love you, John.

3897397 3899566 You can't fake something
like that.
3932057 3934601 Inspector? Sir?

3936019 3938730 Detective Walenski
killed himself last night.
3941066 3942484 I thought you should know.

3945070 3949408 The chief wanted to see you.
Sir?

3956331 3958208 I knew you'd track
the killer down.

3988030 3991200 -How can we help you, sir?
-You can sleep.

4014139 4017768 I wanted to be the first to
congratulate you about the case.
4020354 4023190 Take us to Murdoch.
4054680 4056306 I knew you'd come eventually.

4056348 4058851 Isn't it time
you gave me some answers?

4060185 4062896 Yes, of course.
Won't you please sit down?
4066191 4068068 I come here often.

4068110 4070654 It's one of the few places
I'm allowed some peace.

4071113 4074116 You see, they have
an aversion to water.

4075117 4077119 One could almost call it
a phobia.

4077578 4080205 Who are they?
What do they want from me?

4081957 4086670 For now, let's say you're
the subject of their experiment.

4089840 4095721 I'm sorry, but I have no time
to do this the right way.

4095721 4099725 Everything you need to know
is in this syringe.

4099766 4103353 I need you to inject yourself.
It's the only way to understand.

4103395 4106231 -You're kidding, right?
-We're running out of time!

4106273 4109902 -You have to do this now.
-Give me the gun.

4109943 4112112 He's more disturbed
than we thought.

4112154 4114990 I may not be the judge
of personality you are,

4115032 4117993 but you're the one
who looks disturbed.

4118035 4120537 You don't know what
you're doing.
4121747 4125709 What exactly is in this, Doctor?

4127377 4130547 All the answers you've been
looking for, I swear to you.

4132466 4138263 Guess I'll hold on to it for
safekeeping, if you don't mind.
4138263 4139598 Let's go, Doctor.
4141141 4144311 Go? Where are we going?
4144770 4146480 Shell Beach.

4147606 4151068 That's where you wanted to go,

4159868 4163288 Won't find anything there.
I've been there--
4163330 4165666 Then you can show us the way.

4165707 4169419 I won't. I refuse.
You can't make me go there.

4169419 4171839 Don't you understand?
They'll be waiting for us.

4181139 4185644 I don't understand.
There used to be a bridge here.

4191024 4194111 Try that again, and your friends
will find you in the canal.

4194152 4195946 Don't hurt me.
I'll tell you everything.

4195988 4197739 It doesn't matter anymore
anyway.
4208959 4210502 Who are you people?

4210961 4213714 Must go to the end
of the canal.

4215007 4217676 We will give you some more
pretty things soon...

4218844 4221180 -Anna.
-I'm not Anna.
4222848 4224850 You will be soon, yes.

4229146 4231982 I have another use
for her first.
4241491 4243327 I call them Strangers.

4243911 4246371 They abducted us
and brought us here.

4247539 4252002 This city, everyone in it...
is their experiment.

4252002 4254713 They mix and match our memories
as they see fit,

4254755 4257424 trying to divine
what makes us unique.

4257925 4260761 One day, a man might be
an inspector.

4260844 4263597 The next,
someone entirely different.

4264014 4267434 When they want to study
a murderer, for instance,

4267434 4271939 they simply imprint one of their
citizens with a new personality.

4271939 4276235 Arrange a family for him,
friends, an entire history...
4276276 4278153 even a lost wallet.
4278195 4280322 Then they observe the results.

4281573 4285744 Will a man, given the history of
a killer, continue in that vein?

4286203 4289790 Or are we, in fact, more than
the sum of our memories?

4289831 4294378 This business of you being
a killer was a sad coincidence.

4295045 4297631 You have had dozens of lives
before now.
4297714 4299091 You happened to wake up...

4299132 4301969 while I was imprinting you
with this one.
4302052 4303971 Why are they doing all this?

4304096 4308225 It is our capacity for
individuality, our souls...

4308267 4310102 that makes us different
from them.

4310102 4312604 They think they'll find
the human soul...

4312604 4315315 if they understand
how our memories work.

4315315 4319820 They have collective memories.
They share one group mind.

4319862 4324741 They're dying. Their race is
on the brink of extinction.

4324783 4327786 -They think we can save them.
-Where do I fit in?

4327828 4332332 You're different. You resisted
my attempt to imprint you.

4337254 4340757 Somehow, you have developed
their ability to Tune.

4340757 4344011 That is how they change things,
how they built this city.

4344094 4346972 They have machines buried
beneath the surface...

4346972 4350517 that allow them to focus
their telepathic energies.

4351310 4353937 They control everything here,
even the sun.

4353979 4357149 That's why it's always dark.
They can't stand the light.
4357191 4358650 Why do they need you?
4358692 4360652 When they first brought us here,

4360652 4364990 they extracted what was in us
and stored the information,
4365032 4366950 remixed it like paint...

4366992 4369494 and gave us back
new memories of their choosing.

4369536 4373123 But they still needed an artist
to help them.

4374875 4379838 I understood the human mind
better than they ever could,

4379880 4383509 so they allowed me to keep
my skills as a scientist...
4383509 4385010 because they needed them.

4385010 4387471 They made me delete
everything else.

4396063 4400526 Can you imagine what it's like
to erase your own past?

4400567 4403820 What about my past?
What about my childhood?
4404696 4406782 Shell Beach. Uncle Karl.

4407991 4412079 What about this?
This was blank when I found it.

4412120 4415958 You still don't understand.
You were never a boy.
4415999 4417334 Not in this place.

4417334 4420212 Your history is an illusion,
a fabrication,
4420254 4422089 as it is with all of us.

4422172 4424675 You made those drawings happen
with your gift.
4424675 4426218 You say they brought us here.
4433433 4436603 I'm sorry. I don't remember.

4437437 4441692 None of us remember that...
what we once were...

4441733 4445279 what we might have been...
somewhere else.

4463046 4466800 I've taken you this far.
You don't need me anymore.
4513263 4515474 There is no ocean, John.
4516808 4518936 There's nothing beyond the city.
4520521 4523023 The only place home exists...
4525275 4526860 is in your head.
4574241 4576368 Now you know the truth.

4635928 4638597 You'll allow yourself
to surrender...

4638597 4640933 or it will result in
this one's death.
4640933 4642142 What do I care?

4642643 4644728 She's not my real wife.
She's nothing to me.

4644770 4649441 But you do still care,
don't you, Mr. Murdoch?

4649483 4653737 I have become the monster
you were intended to be.

4655697 4659243 Shall I end her life now,
as you would have?

4662788 4668126 -Don't hurt her, please.
-Then surrender.
4716675 4720179 He is powerful, yes, dangerous.

4720179 4723515 But he can also lead us
to what we seek...
4723557 4726727 what the doctor calls the soul.

4726810 4730731 It is time for our experiment
to move into a final phase.

4730814 4733609 We no longer need
the other subjects.
4733650 4737029 The time for study is over.

4737029 4741366 It is time to be one
with John Murdoch.
4748207 4751543 It is time, Doctor. Imprint.
4754213 4756381 Shut it down!
4757299 4759718 Shut it down forever.
4774358 4775442 What are you doing?

4776360 4781073 They want to imprint you with
their own collective memories.

4782157 4784368 They want to make you
one of them...
4784409 4786578 so they can share your soul.
4786620 4788956 But I've got other plans.

4792334 4795254 Imprint, Doctor.
No more disobedience.

4795254 4799883 I'm sorry. The pain will
only last a moment.
4810978 4812729 Remember, John.

4813730 4815774 You'll rise to greater heights
than that.

4815816 4818277 One day when you're older,
you'll understand.

4821947 4824783 That's it, John.
Practice makes perfect.

4824825 4828078 Now, remember what I told you.
Never talk to strangers.
4828453 4829788 John, remember.

4829997 4832791 You're probably wondering why I
keep appearing in your memories.

4832833 4835294 It's because I have
inserted myself in them.

4835294 4839298 They were fabricated to
teach you about the Strangers.

4839298 4842467 Give you a lifetime of knowledge
in a single syringe.

4845262 4849933 You will survive, John. You'll
find strength within yourself.
4849975 4851518 And you will prevail.

4854021 4856273 -Hi, Uncle Karl.
-Johnny!

4859193 4863322 Getting the hang of it, John.
Maybe one day I'll work for you.

4863947 4867576 Here's the machine the Strangers
use to amplify their thoughts,

4867618 4869369 the machine that changes
their world.

4869411 4872664 You must take control of it.
You must make the machine yours.

4872706 4877336 I know you can beat them,
but you must concentrate.
4879338 4880547 Something's wrong.
4889348 4891183 There is no time for romance.

4891225 4893352 The world can be
what you make it.
4894353 4895395 What have you done?

4896522 4898649 You have the power
to make anything happen...
4898732 4900651 but you must act now.

5184977 5189189 I knew you could do it, John.
You have their power now.

5189273 5191525 -You control their machines.
-Where's Emma?

5192693 5197155 She's not Emma anymore.
She has been reimprinted.

5197155 5199449 -So give her back her memories.
-I can't.

5199491 5203579 The facility where they stored
the memories has been destroyed.
5206790 5208750 What are you going to do now?
5211753 5213255 I'm gonna fix things.

5214882 5218218 You told me I had the power,
didn't you?

5219178 5222097 I can make these machines
do anything I want.

5223182 5225225 Make this world
anything I want it to be.

5226435 5230480 Just so long as I concentrate
hard enough.
5314189 5315399 Where are you going?
5318861 5319862 Shell Beach.

5361236 5362738 -What's the fare?
-A quarter.
5419545 5421547 Been waiting for you, yes?

5422214 5426552 -What are you doing?
-I'm just making a few changes.

5426593 5431473 -We're sure that's what we want?
-I'll take my chances.

5431557 5437312 I'm dying, John. Your imprint
is not agreeable with my kind.

5437396 5439565 But I wanted to know
what it was like.
5441275 5442860 How you feel.

5442985 5445612 You know how I was
supposed to feel.

5445654 5449741 That person isn't me.
Never was.

5449783 5452995 You wanted to know what it was
that makes us human.

5454079 5457875 Well, you're not going to
find it in here.

5459501 5461295 You went looking
in the wrong place.
5560561 5562354 It's so beautiful here.

5575325 5577369 Do you know if Shell Beach
is around here?
5578120 5580497 I think that's it over there.
5598765 5600767 I'm headed that way myself.
5602769 5604104 Would you like to join me?

5613697 5617201 I'm Anna, by the way.
What's your name?
